kit.leader_skill: "Peppy Gals" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%; "Turtle School" or "DB Saga" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +10% for characters who also belong to the "Bond of Master and Disciple" or "Kamehameha" Category ("Peppy Gals" Category characters excluded)

super_attack.name: Turtle School Dance
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Lively and Cheerful Hermit
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 100% up; (Forever) "Turtle School" or "Peppy Gals" Category allies' ATK & DEF 30% up (self excluded); When another 2 or more "Turtle School" Category allies are on the team: Ki +2; ATK & DEF 100% up when attacking with 12 or more Ki; Per "Peppy Gals" Category ally attacking in the same turn: ATK & DEF 30% up

lines.text: "Turtle School" or "Peppy Gals" Category allies' ATK & DEF 30% up (self excluded)

lines.context: When another 2 or more "Turtle School" Category allies are on the team

lines.text: ATK & DEF 100% up when attacking with 12 or more Ki
lines.context: When another 2 or more "Turtle School" Category allies are on the team
